input.sentences: i had a great time in the city yesterday .
there were a lot of good pictures that we took .
i met a lot of new people at the park .
afterward we decided to go home as the sun was setting .
output.sentences: They finally reached the city, stopping to take in the beautiful skyline.
A tree partially blocked their view of the bridge.
A glance to the left revealed a new view of the huge bridge.
A group sat underneath the bridge, along a strip of grass.
As the sun began its descent, they spotted a father with his son toddling along beside him
